participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and driven, Ethan is passionate about video games and dedicated to his career. He has a playful side and enjoys sharing his excitement with others.
participant_1.background: I proposed to my significant other on my last vacation. I was so excited to finally graduate from college and start my career as a video game designer. I'm always hungry. I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me. I've only been at my current job for a few months, but I'm already enjoying it.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Maya is a bit of a free spirit, often more focused on her interests than the expectations of others. She values her independence and finds joy in simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend. I don't wash my clothes as often as I should. I love to clean. I drive a fast sports car. I like to pet my cat to relieve stress and forget about the day.

content.text: Hi, I just graduated from college and started my career as a video game designer!
Congrats! That sounds like a fun job!
Thanks! It's a lot of work, but it's really rewarding.
What kind of video games do you design?
I mostly design action and adventure games.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to make a video game.
It's really fun! But it's also a lot of work.
I bet it is! I'm not sure I have the patience for it.
Well, it's definitely not for everyone. But if you're interested, I'd say go for it!
Thanks! Maybe I will one day.
You should! It's a lot of fun!
I am! I love my job.
